update sys_contact
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dingtalk = #{dingtalk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
twitter = #{twitter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
facebook = #{facebook,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email_enable = #{emailEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone_enable = #{phoneEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dingtalk_enable = #{dingtalkEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wechat_enable = #{wechatEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
twitter_enable = #{twitterEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
facebook_enable = #{facebookEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone_time_of_freq = #{phoneTimeOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dingtalk_time_of_freq = #{dingtalkTimeOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wechat_time_of_freq = #{wechatTimeOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
twitter_time_of_freq = #{twitterTimeOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
facebook_time_of_freq = #{facebookTimeOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone_num_of_freq = #{phoneNumOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dingtalk_num_of_freq = #{dingtalkNumOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wechat_num_of_freq = #{wechatNumOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
twitter_num_of_freq = #{twitterNumOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
facebook_num_of_freq = #{facebookNumOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER},

create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_contact set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dingtalk = #{dingtalk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, twitter = #{twitter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, facebook = #{facebook,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email_enable = #{emailEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone_enable = #{phoneEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dingtalk_enable = #{dingtalkEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wechat_enable = #{wechatEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, twitter_enable = #{twitterEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, facebook_enable = #{facebookEnable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone_time_of_freq = #{phoneTimeOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dingtalk_time_of_freq = #{dingtalkTimeOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wechat_time_of_freq = #{wechatTimeOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, twitter_time_of_freq = #{twitterTimeOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, facebook_time_of_freq = #{facebookTimeOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone_num_of_freq = #{phoneNumOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dingtalk_num_of_freq = #{dingtalkNumOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wechat_num_of_freq = #{wechatNumOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, twitter_num_of_freq = #{twitterNumOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, facebook_num_of_freq = #{facebookNumOfFreq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from sys_contact c where c.del_flag!=1
AND c.name LIKE CONCAT('%','${name}','%')
AND c.email LIKE CONCAT('%','${email}','%')
AND c.phone LIKE CONCAT('%','${phone}','%')
